content.prompt: First, click the green "Submit" button in the centre bottom of the window and follow the instructions on your handout.
content.source_code:
[student_code]
# when you arrive at UofT you need 20 credits
completed = 0
required = 20
credits_to_go = required - completed

# but by Christmas break, you've done
# 5 courses
completed = 5

# oops. They were 5 half-courses
completed = completed / 2

# let's update the credits left to take
credits_to_go = required - completed

# now by April, you have completed 5 full credits
completed = 5

# by the end of 2nd year, you have done 5 more
# TODO: Write your last assignment statement here:

[/student_code]
